Text: iConference Marketbased credit risk managementand Enron Credit are proud to announce an iConference that will help your company address current challenges in credit risk management using a marketbased approach MARKETBASED CREDIT RISK MANAGEMENT WHEN Wednesday June at noon EST pm London time SPEAKER Jeff Kinneman VP and Global Cohead of Enron Credit TOPICS Portfolio approach to credit risk management Marketbased credit risk management process Measure credit has a price Monitor credit exposures can be tracked in realtime Manage credit exposures can be quickly hedged Benefits of portfolio diversification REGISTRATION This event is FREE and you can participate by using any computer with internet access and a telephone Please here register in advance to receive event details cgibinfloyeIduBHCKeCjFBSAAF EVENT SPONSOR This event is brought to you courtesy of Enron Credit To help companies more easily evaluate and manage credit risk Enron Credit has established a marketbased price for credit In addition Enron Credit offers risk mitigation tools that allow you to proactively and dynamically manage your credit portfolio To learn more visit the Enron Credit website at cgibinfloyeIduBHCKeCjFCEeAc If you have questions about our iConferences please email General inquiries can be directed to See you at the iConference The ERiskcom team To change your subscription preferences please go to your account at utilaccountasp If you have never subscribed to our services but would like to do so you may register at utilregisterasp To be reminded of your password go to utilforgotpwdasp
